participant_1.background:
I'm a free spirit who is driven by my passion.
I'm relaxing at home and enjoying some time to myself after my trip to London.
I'm retired and not very tall, but I'm content with my life.
i have 3 brothers.
pizza is my most favorite thing.

participant_2.background:
My family is very supportive of me and they help me to cope with my anxiety.
i collect bugs in jars.
i build my own computers.
I enjoyed Comic Con with my husband last year.
I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers.

content.text: Hey! I'm glad you're enjoying some time to yourself at home. What have you been up to?
Hey! I've been working on a new computer build. I'm a bit of a tech nerd, so I really enjoy it.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm not too good with computers, but I do enjoy using them.
It's not too hard to learn, and it's a lot of fun! What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy reading, cooking, and spending time with my family.
I love to read too! I'm currently reading a book about the history of computers. And I love to cook as well! I love trying new ethnic foods.
That's cool! I'm not much of a cook, but I do enjoy eating. What are some of your favorite ethnic foods?
I love Indian food, Thai food, and Chinese food. I'm also a big fan of pizza!
I love pizza too! It's my favorite food. Do you have any siblings?
I have two sisters and one brother. What about you?
I have three brothers. We're all pretty close.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have a close relationship with your family.
Yeah, I am too. They're my best friends.
Me too! My family is my rock.
